Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils

Class GodsUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils.GodsUtils
public final class GodsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class which contains information about Gods and some static methods to handle them (for example, the God Factory Method).

Regarding the Gods implementation scalability, the necessary steps to add a new God to the game are: 1) Add class and relative implementation in model.gods package 2) Add INFO + Factory + GUI Factory Instantiation here

  • Method Details

    • isValidGod

      public static boolean isValidGod​(java.lang.String godName)
      Utility method used to check if the name typed by the Player is a valid god or not.
      Parameters:
      godName - the name that has to be tested
      Returns:
      true if parameter is a valid god name, false otherwise

    • parseGodName

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parseGodName​(java.lang.String godName) throws UnknownGodException
      Utility method used to get Gods Info from god name (useful when a Player requests info about a god)
      Parameters:
      godName - the name of the God whose info are requested
      Returns:
      the map representing the specific God Info (name, description, power description)
      Throws:
      UnknownGodException - if the parameter is not a valid god name

    • godsFactory

      public static GodStrategy godsFactory​(java.lang.String godName) throws UnknownGodException
      Factory method used to create new GodStrategy instances
      Parameters:
      godName - the name of the God that have to be instantiated
      Returns:
      the requested brand new GodStrategy instance
      Throws:
      UnknownGodException - if the parameter is not a valid god name

    • getGodsInfo

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getGodsInfo()
      Global Gods Info getter
      Returns:
      the info of all Gods

    • godsGuiFactory

      public static GodGuiDrawer godsGuiFactory​(java.lang.String godName) throws UnknownGodException
      Factory method used to create new GodGuiDrawer instances
      Parameters:
      godName - the name of the God that have to be instantiated
      Returns:
      the requested brand new GodGuiDrawer instance
      Throws:
      UnknownGodException - if the parameter is not a valid god name
